name: nativescript-cardview
description: A NativeScript plugin for Material Design CardView component.

scripts.demo.ios: npm run preparedemo; cd demo; tns emulate ios
scripts.demo.android: npm run preparedemo; cd demo; tns emulate android
scripts.preparedemo: npm run build; cd demo; tns plugin remove nativescript-cardview; tns plugin add ..; tns install
scripts.setup: cd demo; npm install; cd ..; npm run build; cd demo; tns plugin add ..; cd ..

author: Brad Martin <bradwaynemartin@gmail.com> (https://github.com/bradmartin)
